price: ߒ߬ߓߊ߬ ߕߊ߲߬ߘߏ ߊߟߊ߫ ߦߋ߫ ߸ ߛߊ߲ ߠߎ߫ ߡߊ߰ߙߌ ߣߌ߫ ߘߎ߱ ߡߊ߰ߙߌ ߸ ߊ߬ ߣߌ߫ ߖߊ߯ߓߊ ߟߎ߫ ߡߊ߰ߙߌ
arabic: فَلِلَّهِ ٱلۡحَمۡدُ رَبِّ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَرَبِّ ٱلۡأَرۡضِ رَبِّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: falillahi al-ḥamdu rabbi al-samāwāti warabbi al-arḍi rabbi al-ʿālamīna
